result.title: Assessment on market potential
result.description: The market study will focus on the national policies towards renewable energy and energy storage, availability and price of electricity, business climate, the presence of target sectors (e.g. manufacturers) and users, and possible other drivers that could assist in the wider implementation (such as EU structural funds).
